# Media Files

This directory contains demo videos and other media files referenced in teacher responses.

## Adding Demo Videos

1. Record or obtain demo videos for each topic (recommended: 60-120 seconds)
2. Name them according to the topic tag (e.g., `subtraction-borrowing.mp4`)
3. Place them in this directory
4. Update `response_templates.yaml` if needed

## Current Topics Needing Videos

- subtraction-borrowing.mp4
- fractions-basics.mp4
- multiplication-basics.mp4
- classroom-management.mp4
- parent-engagement.mp4
- reading-fluency.mp4
- attendance-strategies.mp4
- formative-assessment.mp4
- differentiation.mp4
- addition-basics.mp4
- general-support.mp4

## Video Guidelines

- **Duration**: 60-120 seconds
- **Format**: MP4 (H.264 codec)
- **Resolution**: 720p or lower (for bandwidth)
- **Size**: < 10MB per video
- **Language**: Local language + simple visual demonstrations
- **Content**: Show actual classroom implementation, not just talking head

## Placeholder

For MVP demo, you can use placeholder videos or text descriptions. The system will still work - links will point to `/media/<filename>` even if files don't exist yet.
